question_text: Do the third and fourth icons from the left in the bottom bar both display unread indicators?
needed_knowledge: On Android home screens, a small dot badge on an app icon indicates an unread notification and appears on dock icons as well. Count the dock icons from left to identify the third and fourth icons and check whether both have these dots.
augmented_question: Do both icons inside the red bounding box on the bottom bar show unread indicators?
